verses.verse: And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> out, and departed <S%G4198><s%> from the temple: <S%G2411><s%> and his disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him for to show <S%G1925><s%> him the buildings <S%G3619><s%> of the temple. <S%G2411><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to them, See <S%G991><s%> you not all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things? truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, There shall not be left <S%G863><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> one stone <S%G3037><s%> on another, that shall not be thrown <S%G2647><s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>

And as he sat <S%G2521><s%> on the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him privately, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Tell <S%G2036><s%> us, when <S%G4218><s%> shall these <S%G5023><s%> things be? and what <S%G5101><s%> shall be the sign <S%G4592><s%> of your coming, <S%G3952><s%> and of the end <S%G4930><s%> of the world? <S%G165><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Take heed <S%G991><s%> that no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> deceive <S%G4105><s%> you.
For many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in my name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; <S%G5547><s%> and shall deceive <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

And you shall hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and rumors <S%G189><s%> of wars: <S%G4171><s%> see <S%G3708><s%> that you be not troubled: <S%G2360><s%> for all <S%G3956><s%> these things must <S%G1163><s%> come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, but the end <S%G5056><s%> is not yet. <S%G3768><s%>

For nation <S%G1484><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%> and there shall be famines, <S%G3042><s%> and pestilences, <S%G3061><s%> and earthquakes, <S%G4578><s%> in divers places. <S%G5117><s%>
All <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are the beginning <S%G746><s%> of sorrows. <S%G5604><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> shall they deliver <S%G3860><s%> you up to be afflicted, <S%G2347><s%> and shall kill <S%G615><s%> you: and you shall be hated of all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake.

And then <S%G5119><s%> shall many <S%G4183><s%> be offended, <S%G4624><s%> and shall betray <S%G3860><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another, <S%G240><s%> and shall hate <S%G3404><s%> one <S%G240><s%> another. <S%G240><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> shall rise, <S%G1453><s%> and shall deceive <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>
And because <S%G1223><s%> iniquity <S%G458><s%> shall abound, <S%G4129><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> shall wax <S%G5594><s%> cold. <S%G5594><s%>
But he that shall endure <S%G5278><s%> to the end, <S%G5056><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

And this <S%G5124><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%> of the kingdom <S%G932><s%> shall be preached <S%G2784><s%> in all <S%G3650><s%> the world <S%G3625><s%> for a witness <S%G3142><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> nations; <S%G1484><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> shall the end <S%G5056><s%> come. <S%G2240><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> you therefore <S%G3767><s%> shall see <S%G1492><s%> the abomination <S%G946><s%> of desolation, <S%G2050><s%> spoken <S%G4483><s%> of by Daniel <S%G1158><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> in the holy <S%G40><s%> place, <S%G5117><s%> (whoever <S%G3588><s%> reads, <S%G314><s%> let him understand: <S%G3539><s%> )
Then <S%G5119><s%> let them which be in Judaea <S%G2449><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> into <S%G1909><s%> the mountains: <S%G3735><s%>
Let him which is on <S%G1909><s%> the housetop <S%G1430><s%> not come <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing out of his house: <S%G3614><s%>
Neither <S%G3361><s%> let him which is in the field <S%G68><s%> return <S%G1994><s%> back <S%G3694><s%> to take <S%G142><s%> his clothes. <S%G2440><s%>
And woe <S%G3759><s%> to them that are with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and to them that give suck <S%G2337><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
But pray <S%G4336><s%> you that your <S%G5216><s%> flight <S%G5437><s%> be not in the winter, <S%G5494><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the sabbath <S%G4521><s%> day:

For then <S%G5119><s%> shall be great <S%G3173><s%> tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as was not since <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the world <S%G2889><s%> to this <S%G3568><s%> time, <S%G2540><s%> no, <S%G3361><s%> nor <S%G3364><s%> <S%G3761><s%> ever <S%G3364><s%> shall be.

And except <S%G1508><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> should be shortened, <S%G2856><s%> there should no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be saved: <S%G4982><s%> but for the elect's <S%G1588><s%> sake those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> shall be shortened. <S%G2856><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man shall say <S%G2036><s%> to you, See, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is Christ, <S%G5547><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> there; <S%G5602><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> it not.

For there shall arise <S%G1453><s%> false Christs, <S%G5580><s%> and false <S%G5578><s%> prophets, <S%G5578><s%> and shall show <S%G1325><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders; <S%G5059><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that, if <S%G1487><s%> it were possible, <S%G1415><s%> they shall deceive <S%G4105><s%> the very <S%G2532><s%> elect. <S%G1588><s%>
Behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have told <S%G4280><s%> you before. <S%G4280><s%>

Why <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they shall say <S%G2036><s%> to you, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> he is in the desert; <S%G2048><s%> go <S%G1831><s%> not forth: <S%G1831><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> he is in the secret <S%G5009><s%> chambers; <S%G5009><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> it not.

For as the lightning <S%G796><s%> comes <S%G1831><s%> out of the east, <S%G395><s%> and shines <S%G5316><s%> even to the west; <S%G1424><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be.
For wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G1437><s%> the carcass <S%G4430><s%> is, there <S%G1563><s%> will the eagles <S%G105><s%> be gathered <S%G4863><s%> together. <S%G4863><s%>

Immediately <S%G2112><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> the tribulation <S%G2347><s%> of those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> shall the sun <S%G2246><s%> be darkened, <S%G4654><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> shall not give <S%G1325><s%> her light, <S%G5338><s%> and the stars <S%G792><s%> shall fall <S%G4098><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> and the powers <S%G1411><s%> of the heavens <S%G3772><s%> shall be shaken: <S%G4531><s%>

And then <S%G5119><s%> shall appear <S%G5316><s%> the sign <S%G4592><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> in heaven: <S%G3772><s%> and then <S%G5119><s%> shall all <S%G3956><s%> the tribes <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> mourn, <S%G2875><s%> and they shall see <S%G3700><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in the clouds <S%G3507><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> with power <S%G1411><s%> and great <S%G4183><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And he shall send <S%G649><s%> his angels <S%G32><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> sound <S%G5456><s%> of a trumpet, <S%G4536><s%> and they shall gather <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> his elect <S%G1588><s%> from the four <S%G5064><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> from one end <S%G206><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> to the other. <S%G1565><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> of the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree; <S%G4808><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> his branch <S%G2798><s%> is yet <S%G2236><s%> tender, <S%G527><s%> and puts <S%G1631><s%> forth <S%G1631><s%> leaves, <S%G5444><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is near: <S%G1451><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> you, when <S%G3752><s%> you shall see <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, know <S%G1097><s%> that it is near, <S%G1451><s%> even at <S%G1909><s%> the doors. <S%G2374><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, This <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> shall not pass, <S%G3928><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things be fulfilled. <S%G1096><s%>
Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> shall pass <S%G3928><s%> away, <S%G3928><s%> but my words <S%G3056><s%> shall not pass <S%G3928><s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

But of that day <S%G2250><s%> and hour <S%G5610><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man , <S%G3762><s%> no, <S%G3761><s%> not the angels <S%G32><s%> of heaven, <S%G3772><s%> but my Father <S%G3962><s%> only. <S%G3441><s%>
But as the days <S%G2250><s%> of Noe <S%G3575><s%> were, so <S%G3779><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be.

For as in the days <S%G2250><s%> that were before <S%G4253><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> they were eating <S%G5176><s%> and drinking, <S%G4095><s%> marrying <S%G1060><s%> and giving in marriage, <S%G1547><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that Noe <S%G3575><s%> entered <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the ark, <S%G2787><s%>

And knew <S%G1097><s%> not until <S%G2193><s%> the flood <S%G2627><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> and took <S%G142><s%> them all <S%G537><s%> away; <S%G142><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> the coming <S%G3952><s%> of the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> be.
Then <S%G5119><s%> shall two <S%G1417><s%> be in the field; <S%G68><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> shall be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G1520><s%> left. <S%G863><s%>

Two <S%G1417><s%> women <S%G1135><s%> shall be grinding <S%G229><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the mill; <S%G3459><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> shall be taken, <S%G3880><s%> and the other <S%G1520><s%> left. <S%G863><s%>
Watch <S%G1127><s%> therefore: <S%G3767><s%> for you know <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G4169><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> does come. <S%G2064><s%>

But know <S%G1097><s%> this, <S%G1565><s%> that if <S%G1487><s%> the manager <S%G3611><s%> of the house <S%G3617><s%> had known <S%G1492><s%> in what <S%G4169><s%> watch <S%G5438><s%> the thief <S%G2812><s%> would come, <S%G2064><s%> he would have watched, <S%G1127><s%> and would not have suffered <S%G1439><s%> his house <S%G3614><s%> to be broken <S%G1358><s%> up.

Therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> be you also <S%G2532><s%> ready: <S%G2092><s%> for in such an hour <S%G5610><s%> as you think <S%G1380><s%> not the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> comes. <S%G2064><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> and wise <S%G5429><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his lord <S%G2962><s%> has made <S%G2525><s%> ruler <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> his household, <S%G2322><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> them meat <S%G5160><s%> in due season? <S%G2540><s%>
Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is that servant, <S%G1401><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> his lord <S%G2962><s%> when he comes <S%G2064><s%> shall find <S%G2147><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> doing. <S%G4160><s%>
Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That he shall make <S%G2525><s%> him ruler <S%G2525><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> his goods. <S%G5224><s%>
But and if <S%G1437><s%> that evil <S%G2556><s%> servant <S%G1401><s%> shall say <S%G2036><s%> in his heart, <S%G2588><s%> My lord <S%G2962><s%> delays <S%G5549><s%> his coming; <S%G2064><s%>
And shall begin <S%G756><s%> to smite <S%G5180><s%> his fellow servants, <S%G4889><s%> and to eat <S%G2068><s%> and drink <S%G4095><s%> with the drunken; <S%G3184><s%>

The lord <S%G2962><s%> of that servant <S%G1401><s%> shall come <S%G2240><s%> in a day <S%G2250><s%> when he looks <S%G4328><s%> not for him, and in an hour <S%G5610><s%> that he is not aware <S%G1097><s%> of,

And shall cut <S%G1371><s%> him asunder, <S%G1371><s%> and appoint <S%G5087><s%> him his portion <S%G3313><s%> with the hypocrites: <S%G5273><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> shall be weeping <S%G2805><s%> and gnashing <S%G1030><s%> of teeth. <S%G3599><s%>
